analysis:
**1. The Core Claim(s):**
The claim suggests that fake news indicates President Lula has withdrawn from the 2026 election.

**2. Evidence Breakdown:**
*   Multiple sources indicate that Lula intends to run for a fourth term in the 2026 election.
*   A news report from February 22, 2026, identifies a fake news narrative suggesting Lula might withdraw from the election if the risk of defeat increases.
*   On February 26, 2026, Boatos.org refuted claims that Lula had withdrawn from the 2026 election, confirming that no official announcement had been made and that recent statements from Lula and his ministers reinforce his intention to seek re-election.
*   In October 2024, Minister Luiz Marinho stated that it is "fake" that Lula will not compete in the 2026 elections.

**3. Context & Nuance:**
The claim is based on a false narrative. While there have been reports about the possibility of Lula not running, these have been identified as fake news. Lula himself and his allies have indicated his intention to run for re-election. Recent polls show a tightening race between Lula and potential opponents, which may be contributing to the spread of misinformation.

**4. Red Flags & Discrepancies:**
No major discrepancies found in the verified sources.

grounding_citations.title: A mais nova fake news bolsonarista sobre a candidatura de Lula à reeleição
grounding_citations.snippet: Após pesquisa Quaest, aliados de Flávio Bolsonaro difundem tese de que Lula pode desistir da reeleição se risco de derrota crescer. ... A mais nova fake news bolsonarista sobre a candidatura de Lula à reeleição.

grounding_citations.title: Fake news aponta que presidente Lula acaba de desistir da eleição 2026 - Boatos.org
grounding_citations.snippet:
Fake news aponta que presidente Lula acaba de desistir da eleição 2026
(2026-02-26) Boato – O presidente Lula teria anunciado sua desistência da candidatura em 2026 após um suposto erro grave. Análise. Recentemente, uma série de publicações começou a ganhar tração em plataformas de vídeo, especialmente no YouTube e no TikTok, com títulos alarmantes envolvendo o cenário político para 2026.

grounding_citations.title: Poll shows Flávio Bolsonaro drawing level with Lula in a potential Brazil runoff - MercoPress
grounding_citations.snippet: Brazil's President Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva and Senator Flávio Bolsonaro are virtually tied in a simulated second-round vote for October's election, according to an AtlasIntel survey conducted for Bloomberg News — the first poll to show the pair at parity in a head-to-head scenario.

media_literacy.tone_analysis: The tone is neutral and objective.
